long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your video watching experience with PiP! The effortless way to enable Picture-in-Picture mode on any website. A one-click solution to float your favorite videos over other windows, allowing you to multitask with pro skills.

Quickstart:
Add the PiP! extension to Chrome.
Navigate to any website with a video.
Click the PiP! icon in your toolbar.
The video will pop out in a floating window that remains on top as you navigate other tabs or applications.
